name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, proficient in C#, cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure DevOps**, and specialized in building secure and scalable applications using robust user management systems such as SSO and RBAC. I possess strong expertise in SQL and **MySQL**, ensuring optimal data handling and compliance with security standards like **OWASP**. 
My technical breadth includes full-stack development leveraging **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, complemented by a solid understanding of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices, enabling streamlined pipelines for continuous delivery. I have successfully led projects within the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities and enhancing system efficiency through microservices architecture and event-driven systems. 
With hands-on experience developing machine learning pipelines and effectively serving ML models in production environments, I am committed to driving innovation and delivering high-performance solutions.

Developed and optimized SQL queries for managing large datasets in **MySQL**, enhancing data retrieval speeds by **40%** for financial reporting and analytics.
Integrated robust security measures following **OWASP** guidelines to protect sensitive user and transaction data, reducing security vulnerabilities by conducting regular audits.
Led the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, boosting scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
